data.name: Sketch! Run! Demo
data.detailed_description:
Once upon a time a school-boy got a copy-book. But it was not a usual one! Anything you draw in this copy-book becomes alive. And so did Liny! The romantic character, who wants to learn more about the world and become free!

But it is not so easy. He has to overcome numerous obstacles. Water or an eraser can destroy him. So, sharpen your pencil and draw! Do not let Liny stop on his way towards a dream!


A hundred of wonderful levels is waiting for you: you will be able to relax and enjoy!

As of now the game is at the stage of closed alpha testing. If you want to join, write to us! vigamesofficial@gmail.com
data.about_the_game:
Once upon a time a school-boy got a copy-book. But it was not a usual one! Anything you draw in this copy-book becomes alive. And so did Liny! The romantic character, who wants to learn more about the world and become free!

But it is not so easy. He has to overcome numerous obstacles. Water or an eraser can destroy him. So, sharpen your pencil and draw! Do not let Liny stop on his way towards a dream!


A hundred of wonderful levels is waiting for you: you will be able to relax and enjoy!

As of now the game is at the stage of closed alpha testing. If you want to join, write to us! vigamesofficial@gmail.com
data.short_description: Once upon a time the scribblesÂ  in a copy-book became alive. And Liny became alive together with them. He is eager to get to know more about the real world and visit it! But lots of difficulties are expecting him on his way. Help him to become free!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT720
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
